name: Escape from Hell (rogi9943)
description:
■Retro side-scroll style game
A classic belt-scroll-style game with easy and compact operation.
Players with no experience in games can adapt quickly.

■Different kinds of guns
Use 3 different guns to subdue the enemy.
We have easy-to-handle SMGs, a machine gun with a strong warhead, and a shotgun that can easily be overpowered 
by a strong enemy.

■6 kinds of enemies
Survive from various kinds of enemies that threaten your life.
You can also develop strategies to respond to different enemies features.

■Low aggressive art style
Experience a graphic drawn in a cute Anime style.
People who don't like horror genre can enjoy it.
